ACT. Consulting

From start-ups, to public and large private firms, ACT. Consulting will work with you to initialise and support your Testing capabilities. Using our methods and expertise, we will support releasing quality software through your development lifecycle, making each release better every-time

About ACT. Consulting

ACT. Consulting are independent of large consulting firms, our ambition is to bring expertise and not numbers. As a team we strive to support each other, understanding not only new technologies but existing as well.
